name: Somerford Hall

reviews.text: I had the great priviledge of attending my cousins wedding reception at Somerford Hall on the 18th June. The venue was very beautiful and you could not fault the grounds and public rooms within the property. The entire time there was run with great efficiency and all food served was of a very high standard. The only change I would like to see is for draft larger / beer and real ale to be available from the bar (looked a bit cheap being when the beer was poored from a can!)
reviews.title: Beautiful Wedding venue - Accomodation needs some attention

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The bedrooms were of a reasonable standard and the decor was very pleasent, however the matresses were of a very poor quality and did not allow for any quality sleep (you could feel every spring). Also the room was not perfectly clean (quite a bit of dust about). In addition as it is 2011 and when paying £145 for a room I would expect the basics such as a hair dryer and a decent size flat screen tv in the room.
reviews.title: GREAT VENUE, OK SERVICE

reviews.text: All things considered I think the this made an ideal wedding venue and would be sure any bride and groom would be proud to have their reception there - although this is not a hotel they are charging hotel rates so please make sure the accomodation is up to standard!
reviews.title: Fantastic venue,excellent service,superb food,

reviews.text: The setting is gorgeous, the food very good indeed, lots of guests commented on it. The attention to detail with regards to our wishes for our wedding was not great though. Quotes were wrong, wine incorrectly listed, bar tab on the night was wrong and spirits were included when they shouldnt have been - and more. All were relatively small issues but for a venue like Somerford and the price you pay i would have expected a lot higher level of service. Rooms are nice, some a little expensive for what they are though
reviews.title: Perfect place to get married

reviews.text: Our daughter and son in-law have just had their wedding reception at Somerford Hall,and i can highly recommend it.The venue was perfect,we had the whole house to ourselves,with a lovely terrace area with seating for the guests.The largest of the rooms is decorated in a wedgewood blue style decor,with large original fireplaces.We stayed overnight rooms were large and very comfortable.The food and service was outstanding,we were looked after and wanted for nothing.The bar prices were very good too,not like other venues that charge ridiculous prices.Everyone had a wonderful time and the full english breakfast the following morning,was the best ive had in a long time.
reviews.title: Great location and service

description: Somerford Hall is an elegant Georgian mansion set in over 200 acres of landscaped parkland. This stunning setting provides the perfect backdrop for a wide range of events – from weddings and special celebrations to conferencing and corporate hospitality - or just the perfect brief escape from today's busy world.Somerford Hall offers an intimate, relaxed ambience. Residents - and their guests - have exclusive use of all of the facilities, including our fully licensed bar and restaurant. Whether you choose to relax in one of our elegant sitting rooms, enjoy a drink on the terrace or take a stroll throughout the picturesque grounds, you're sure to leave us feeling relaxed and refreshed.
